productDetails.data:
Give your loved ones the Gift of Sustainability by donating towards the Sewing Machine Project on their behalf. The donation contributes towards sponsoring Sewing Machines for women in the Punjab region of Pakistan and the opportunity to rise out of poverty and start her own debt-free business.
You can donate any amount towards a Sewing Machine (minimum £5) or pay the full cost of 1, which is just £50.
Each card will have a case study on the back and come with a Kraft Envelope, ready for giving!

*To help you get the pieces you want before they sell out, we have introduced a pre-order option for this style!
To pre-order, you will need to add this piece to your shopping cart, selecting the 'pre-order' option. You will then need to follow the check-out process as normal and pay for the item.
Send across the size and length you would like the piece in (or your full measurements) to electricbazaar.shop@gmail.com with your name as the reference. You can also request any adjustment to the design (eg. sleeve style)
As soon as the piece is ready (please allow 4-6 weeks) it will be shipped out to you!*
